name: SMANewsToday
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: The SMA News Today skill offers Alexa users access to a daily flash briefing on the news and columns published on the SMA News Today website. Reaching over 20,000 spinal muscular atrophy patients and caregivers monthly, SMA News' goal is to bring the latest science, research and advocacy news to the SMA community online. The information in this skill is provided for informational and educational purposes only.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
